snippet: The proposed merger of two European defense and aerospace giants was a marriage not made in heaven, as one editorial commented on Thursday. But does the collapse of the deal send a broader message about the prospect of tighter European integration?
abstract: The proposed merger of two European defense and aerospace giants was a marriage not made in heaven, as one editorial commented on Thursday. But does the collapse of the deal send a broader message about the prospect of tighter European integration?

headline.main: Self-Interest Leads to Collapse of BAE-EADS Merger

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
